## What would you like to see added or changed?

A clear and concise description of the feature or improvement.

## Which TA-Lib indicator(s) are involved?

If this is about adding a new indicator, please list the TA-Lib function name(s)
(e.g. `TA_RSI`, `TA_MACD`) and link to the relevant entry in
[`ta_func.h`](https://github.com/TA-Lib/ta-lib/blob/main/include/ta_func.h).

## Why is this useful?

Explain the use case. How would you use this in practice?

## Are you willing to contribute a PR?

- [ ] Yes, I can implement this myself
- [ ] I can help with testing / review
- [ ] No, I am just making a suggestion

## Additional context

Any other context, references, or examples.
